Ladies don't start fights, but they can finish them. –Marie (The Aristocats)

I knew when I met you, an adventure was going to happen. –Pooh
I wonder how many wishes a star can give. –Pooh
Laughter is timeless, imagination has no age, and dreams are forever. –Walt Disney
Love? Just a boy, meeting a girl under the right conditions. –The King (Cinderella)
